forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 61. Northeast wind around 13 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph.

forecast.name: Monday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 72. Northeast wind 9 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 28 mph.

weather_report:
Amidst the gentle embrace of early morning, Boston awakens under a cloak of soft clouds, the low hum of a northeast wind whispering through the streets, nudging the city into the day's rhythm. With temperatures resting comfortably around sixty-one, this serene setting is markedly tranquil, yet the air carries an electric hint of wind gusts that might catch you off guard. It’s a moment when the muted hues of twilight retreat, albeit reluctantly, yielding to the promise of a brightening sky.

As the sun rises higher, Boston will transform into a canvas painted with varying shades of blue, promising warmth and delight with a high of seventy-two. The northeast breeze will continue, lending a playful energy to the day, perfect for a stroll along the Charles or a leisurely coffee at a sidewalk café. The conditions are not without their charm; the early clouds could weave a delicate texture to the sunny backdrop, inviting those who take the time to look for beauty in changing light.

For those venturing out, a light jacket may prove wise against the freshness of the wind, while layers are recommended for the gradual warmth that will fill the afternoon. Consider a quiet excursion to one of the city’s many parks or perhaps an exploration of its tucked-away bookstores. In this cozy, unhurried reverie, one might find joy in the mundane - the sound of rustling leaves, the distant laughter of children at play, or a simple conversation over coffee.
